Package ohos.miscservices.download

Class DownloadConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.miscservices.download.DownloadConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class DownloadConfig
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Defines configuration of download sessions.

    This class provides parameters for download session configuration, such as URIs, network types, storage paths, and DownloadConfig.

    Use DownloadConfig.Builder#Builder(Context, Uri) to create a Builder using the parameters. Example code: 

     
 DownloadConfig.Builder builder = new DownloadConfig.Builder(Context,DOWNLOAD_URI);
 builder.setTitle("Download")
 DownloadConfig config = builder.build();
 
 
    

    

    Since:
    

    3
